summary: This document is an email chain between attorney Stacey Richman and Mark L. Epstein. The forwarded message from Mark Epstein is a cryptic text referencing a 'Pauline' whose life is in danger, to which Epstein replies he doesn't know any Paulines except his deceased mother. The document shows communication between Epstein's brother and his attorney regarding a strange, potentially threatening message.

events.title: Cryptic 'Pauline' Message Received
events.description: Mark L. Epstein receives a text message warning 'Watch out for Pauline, her life is in danger' and forwards it to his attorney Stacey Richman.

keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein, brother of Jeffrey Epstein, received a cryptic text message on May 24, 2020, stating 'Watch out for Pauline, her life is in danger'.
Mark Epstein forwarded this message to his attorney, Stacey Richman, stating he did not know any Paulines except his mother, who had been dead for 16 years.
The communication shows Mark Epstein was in contact with his attorney regarding potentially threatening or strange messages in May 2020.
